channel.title: gamedev on Porrith Suong

item.title: Video Scripts
item.description: I work with Thousand Ant and create educational videos to explain a client’s tech stack. Clients currently include: Unity Technologies and Genvid Technologies. Unity Technologies ML Agents In addition to writing the script for the video and providing the screen capture, I also updated and trained the official agents for Unity’s Kart Microgame update. Device Simulator There are more videos coming and I will update this when Unity officially publishes the videos!
